name: EMF Camp
description: Camping festival for hackers, artists, geeks, crafters, scientists, and engineers. (July)

name: STRP
description: STRP Festival is one of the largest art & technology (e-culture) festivals in Europe where music, art and technology meet. (April)

name: Micro Meso Macro
description: Exploring the frontiers of data representation (November)

name: Creative Code Berlin Meetup
description: Diverse community of people interested in the use of computing skills for artistic expression.

name: Beyond tellerrand
description: An affordable event about web design, development, creativity, design and much more with multiple events throughout the year.

name: Wirefly
description: The first tech & arts festival of its kind in Germany ⪢ 4 days of ✓ talks ✓ music ✓ events ✓ food ✓ camping - all that and more at a unique venue on the beach! (August)

name: Ars Electronica Festival
description: Festival for art, technology and society. (September)

name: Digital Design Days
description: 3 day event for the digital design industry. (October)

name: Signal Festival
description: 4 day themed festival showcasing digital installations across the city. (October)

name: Sensorium Festival
description: 3 day festival for designers, creative directors, technologists, architects, innovators, artists and scientists interested in humane technology. (June)

name: Creative Coding Stockholm
description: Meetup group for anyone interested in creating art using programming languages.

name: Creating Coding Copenhagen
description: Meetup group for people of all skill levels interested in generative art, machine learning for creative purpose or tech-based art in general.

name: Mutek Montréal
description: Electronic music and the digital arts festival. (March)

name: FITC Toronto
description: 3 day celebration of the best the world has to offer in design, web development, media and innovation in creative technologies. (April)

name: Eyeo Festival
description: Festival for Artists, data designers, creative coders, AI explorers, storytellers, tool & platform developers, and researchers all. (June)

name: CODAME ART+TECH Festival
description: Explores the manifold dimensions of SPACE with an incredible lineup schedule, including nightlife installations and performances, a variety of workshops, and community gathering art+tech salon to close off the Festival. (October)

name: p5.js Contributors Conference
description: Whilst most work happens online, every now and then artists, designers, developers and educators get together to advance the p5.js project.

name: Mutek Mexico
description: Electronic music and the digital arts festival. (November)

description: Electronic music and the digital arts festival. (September)

description: Electronic music and the digital arts festival. (December)
